title: Bug 2345 [Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345 [Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file is already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', nothing happens. The scripted resource editor example is not replaced with the Default Text Editor.
EB: When selecting a file in the Navigator and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', a new editor should open on the file with the Default Text Editor, replacing the scripted resource editor example.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file 'test.xml'.
3. The file will be opened with the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content.
4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'.
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With...'.
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'.
7. Observe that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example is still active.

Expected result:
A new editor should open on the selected file with the Default Text Editor, replacing the scripted resource editor example.

Notes:
